actions.text: Amendment SA 2175, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 238.

Amendment SA 2175 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8169-8170, S8179-8180; text: CR S8169-8170) To propose an alternative to section 1033, relating to a limitation on the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2175, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 238.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2175, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 238.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2175 proposed by Senator Levin.

purpose: To propose an alternative to section 1033, relating to a limitation on the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
